abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo will call for raise in state minimum wage to $15; Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr is expected to join him for announcement at Jacob K Javits Convention Center.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is expected to announce his support during an event in Manhattan on Thursday, which Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. will attend.

headline.main: Cuomo Set to Back $15 Minimum Wage Across New York State
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Is Set to Support Lifting Wage to $15 for All

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is expected to announce his support during an event in Manhattan on Thursday, which Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. will attend.
